chapters.title: The Launch
chapters.content: Once upon a time, in the year 2150, humans had successfully colonized several planets in our galaxy. However, there was one planet that remained unexplored - Zorax. A family of four was embarking on a journey to explore this mysterious planet. They boarded their spaceship and got ready for their long journey.
chapters.illustration: A family of four boarding their spaceship.

chapters.title: Sweet Dreams
chapters.content: As they arrived at Zorax, the AI crew put the family into a deep sleep to conserve resources during the long journey. The little boy nestled into his bed and started dreaming about all sorts of adventures he might have on this new planet.
chapters.illustration: The little boy snuggled up in his bed surrounded by stars.

chapters.title: Waking Up To New Beginnings
chapters.content: After sleeping through most of the journey, the little boy woke up feeling groggy but excited to explore Zorax with his family. As he walked out of his room and looked out at this new world through the ship's windows he gasped as he saw beautiful landscapes unlike anything he had ever seen before.
chapters.illustration: The little boy looking out at an alien landscape from inside the spaceship.

messages.name: Alex
messages.content: Tell me a bedtime story from the future - a kid is going to bed on a spaceship docked at the surface of a large planned. The kid and their family are leaving on a new frontier and they will be sleeping through most of the journey. A helpful AI crew would steer the ship and wake them up when they arrive
